titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

did.repository: The Historical Society of Pennsylvania 1300 Locust Street Philadelphia, PA 19107

scopecontent.p: 12 cartons of financial records, marketing tools, and other archival records, 1973-1997. acknowledgments for donations and photocopies of checks meeting minutes, agendas for development committees ; also correspondence and reports related to fundraising and fundraising strategies planning materials for annual and one-time events, including correspondence, printed materials, and logistical information questionnaires and proposals related to technology project grant applications from organizations including final reports. a few newsletters

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
